= Building =

The GNU Radio Blocks were tested on Ubuntu 11.04 and Ubuntu 12.04.

  # Get the source code:
   * svn checkout http://sdr-experience.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sdr-experience-read-only
  # Run CMAKE builder:
   * mkdir build
   * cd build
   * cmake ../sdr-experience-read-only/gnuradio-blocks/gr-howto/
  # Make and Install it:
   * make 
   * sudo make install 
   * sudo ldconfig
